info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 2:56PM EDT until September 09 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hudson County in northeastern New Jersey... Southeastern Bergen County in northeastern New Jersey... Bronx County in southeastern New York... New York (Manhattan) County in southeastern New York... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 254 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Harlem, or over Mott Haven, and is nearly stationary. Additional storms were building to the south and west of this storm. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mott Haven, East Tremont, Ridgefield, Midtown Manhattan, Harlem, Riverdale, Co- op City, Fort Lee, Teterboro, Long Island City, Upper West Side, North Bergen, West New York, Cliffside Park, and Palisades Park. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
